product_name: Bumble and bumbleHeat Shield Thermal Protection Hair Mist
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingBumble and bumble Heat Shield Thermal Protection Mist protects dried hair against heat tools (up to 450°F), repairs damage, and helps prevent breakage, thanks to our Honey Protective Complex. Plus, it conditions, reduces frizz, and improves elasticity.
details: DetailsBenefitsRepairs damage and helps prevent breakageConditions, reduces frizz, and improves elasticityProvides heat and UV protectionAdded UV Filters help protect hair against the drying effects of the sun.StrengthenShineColor-safeKey IngredientsHoney Protective Complex: Conditions to help prevent breakage.Fragrance FamilyA hint of blood orange citrus, heart of wild orchid, and a blonde wood finish.Item 2574733How To UseShake well. Spray heat protectant hair mist onto dried hair, and heat-style.From the Pros: As you finish blow-drying your hair and you're ready to style it, add Heat Shield Thermal Protection Mist to the ends of the hair to protect and polish your look. After heat styling, allow your hair to cool, then rake your fingers through it --- this helps distribute any products you applied, allowing them to benefit from your styling efforts even moreIngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Alcohol Denat., Propanediol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dimethicone, Honey\Mel\Miel, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/ Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Octyldodecyl Citrate Crosspolymer, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethyl Macadamiate, Panthenol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, BHT, Butylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, PhenoxyethanolPlease be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well. Spray heat protectant hair mist onto dried hair, and heat-style.From the Pros: As you finish blow-drying your hair and you're ready to style it, add Heat Shield Thermal Protection Mist to the ends of the hair to protect and polish your look. After heat styling, allow your hair to cool, then rake your fingers through it --- this helps distribute any products you applied, allowing them to benefit from your styling efforts even more
ingredients: Hydrogenated Castor Oil/ Sebacic Acid Copolymer

PhenoxyethanolPlease be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I would by this product again and again!
reviews.comments: I love, love, love this heat protectant!  My hair is shiny, smooth and bouncy!! Highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: My favorite heat protector.
reviews.comments: I've used several other heat protectors and this is by far my favorite. It doesn't make your hair feel stiff but it does the job and smells great too!

reviews.headline: 2ns ingredient is denatured alcohol
reviews.comments: This dried my hair to brittle straw and had to cut mt hair half off to salvage it

reviews.headline: My new go to as my hair is fine and wavy.
reviews.comments: This has been the best product I've used so far.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Been using this product for years and have always felt it does a great job protecting my hair from heat damage. Never leaves my hair feeling or looking greasy and smeels nice.

reviews.headline: The best thermal protection spray ever!
reviews.comments:
I love so many things about this spray.
1. Smells amazing.  
2. It is not sticky.  
3. It holds my curl for days.
4. It doesn't dry my hair out.
5. It makes my hair shiny

I have searched for years for a spray that works for my fine hair.  This is definitely a winner!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Love this product when straightening my hair. It gives protection and shine without filling sticky..

reviews.headline: Works vreat
reviews.comments: This was used on my hair in  the salon and I liked it. I've been using for about 6 months now. My hair seems to be in good shape so I'd say it works well. The only downfall is the price.

reviews.headline: Repeat Purchase - My Go-To Thermal Shield
reviews.comments: This is my go-to thermal protectant for high-heat tools.  Hair remains protected, soft and healthy without frying into a crispy crunch.  Product distributes evenly and dries relatively quickly.  Nice mild scent.

reviews.headline: Love but I wish the size was bigger for price
reviews.comments: I love this producy and what it did for my hair! It is just a little pricey for such a small bottle.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I really loved

reviews.headline: Smells so good
reviews.comments: Smells really good leaves my hair looking great!

reviews.headline: Didn't do much
reviews.comments: use it a few times when I first bought, and noticed that it didn't make a difference. My hair still felt dry and it didn't feel like it was protecting it from the heat. I gave it a couple more tries stil my hair was frizzy, sticky and rough. I usally use chi oil or this other oil this was my first time using a spray.

reviews.headline: Didn't do much
reviews.comments: use it a few times when I first bought, and noticed that it didn't make a difference. My hair still felt dry and it didn't feel like it was protecting it from the heat. I gave it a couple more tries stil my hair was frizzy, sticky and rough. I usally use chi oil or this other oil this was my first time using a spray.

reviews.headline: Skip if you have damaged & dry hair
reviews.comments: Picked up this product because I saw it and thought it would be nice to try something new. This product made my hair feel brittle and I was very aware my hair had product post straightening or curling. My hair did not do well with this product. I also have very coarse, dry and damaged hair.

reviews.headline: Great for fine hair
reviews.comments: I havent noticed any damage since I started using this with my curling iron. It protects much better than the invisible oil spray, which I love for blow drying. My hair is fine and a little thin, so most products make it look greasy. This is the best line I've found for good heat protection and frizz control, it's nearly undetectable.

reviews.headline: Pretty good!
reviews.comments:
I bought the travel size of this product after deciding to seitch from my Chi 44 Iron Guard (which i HATED). I love the way this bumble and bumble heat protectant didnt make my hair frizzy, didnt leave a sticky/stiff residue on my strands, and it smells so good. My hair doesnt feel dry after using the iron over it which is a huge pro for me. Ive only used it one time but was overall happy with the outcome. My only complain at this time is that i do feel like it made my hair a little greasy. Not sure if this is user error and i just used too much or if its a common occurrence with this product but regardless, a little dry shampoo and hairspray covered that up just fine. I would repurchase! 

For reference i have pin straight super fine hair that gets the ends bleached for a balayage 2x/year

reviews.headline: Returned it
reviews.comments: Very strong scent.  I could stand the snell

reviews.headline: Lightweight and protects
reviews.comments: I have fine hair and this thermal spray does not weigh my hair down like some other products I've tried.  It also sprays as a fine mist, rather than squirting out of the pump, which works very well to get the product evenly distributed.  I bought a couple of bottles when it was on sale because like it so much!

reviews.headline: This is my holy grail haircare!
reviews.comments: The entire Bond Building line is my holy grail haircare. I use the shampoo, conditioner and the heat shield before I blow dry my hair and it turns out silky and smooth. I have fine, frizzy hair that is damaged from at home hair coloring. This is the only line of products that makes my hair smooth and soft. It's a little pricey, and I'm not happy about them reducing the size of the bottle, but if you've tried everything and nothing works, seriously, try this.

media.headline: A perfect addition to my routine!
AMAZING!!!
media.caption: My hair after using this product & straighteners my hair! It's naturally wavy/curly.

media.headline: Great for dry and bleached hair!

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this product on my hair when damp or dry prior to straightening my hair. My hair feels sooo soft & silky smooth after I straighten it as if I just left the salon! It's also helped prevent any more damage to my hair since my flat iron uses a heat of 400 degrees. The scent is heavenly as well. I get many compliments on my hair. This product helps hydrate my hair, add shine, decrease frizz, create soft/silky feel of hair, & prevents further damage. I did receive this product free for testing purposes. However, I will be purchasing when I run out! This product is better than any other heat protectant I've tried. My hair is very complicated & this product is a miracle in a bottle!
faceoff_positive.headline: AMAZING!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I purchased a small bottle at Ulta recently and wasn't very impressed. It makes my hair feel weird after I straighten it (I let the product fully dry on my hair BEFORE straightening it) when I run my hands through my hair, it would feel dry, starchy, crunchy, tight, I don't know how to perfectly describe it, but I do know it's not the best feeling. I'm going to stick with the other heat protectant from this same brand, the orange and white bottle. That UV/Heat protectant isn't as watery as this one, and it is slightly heavier when sprayed, but it dries down light, and makes my hair feel so soft! Not to mention, the smell is SO much better, it lasts a long time too! The only thing this product did do was make my hair appear less frizzy and appear more shiner.
faceoff_negative.headline: Didn't work for me
